price: 116. Zij zeiden: “Als jij niet stopt, Noah. Dan zou je je zeker onder degenen die gestenigd zijn, bevinden.”
arabic: قَالُواْ لَئِن لَّمۡ تَنتَهِ يَٰنُوحُ لَتَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلۡمَرۡجُومِينَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: qālū la-in lam tantahi yānūḥu latakūnanna mina al-marjūmīna
